data/tweet-crypto/2022/6/153520292707747:
Nice trick if you run your own bitcoin node:
- go to directory where your node stores blocks
- open terminal
- type: hexdump -C -s 8 -n 285 blk00000.dat https://t.co/WZRofKpCnL
